meaning_str.bing:
n. 师；分配；分开；分歧
网络. 除法；部门；分割

分开；分配；除法；部门；分歧；不和；分界线；（军队编制中的）师；（英国议会的）分组表决；（足球等体育运动中联赛的）级

1.en: So far, those who have spoken publicly on the issue have distinguished between the British newspaper division and the America-based company.
1.cn: 迄今为止，那些公开讨论这件事情的人都把新闻集团的英国报业部分跟美国公司区分开来。

2.en: They took me to the homicide division, and played a cassette tape on which a man I knew named Kevin Freeman accused me of shooting a man.
2.cn: 他们把我带到了杀人犯区审讯，播放一盒录音带，在这段录音中，我认识的一个名叫凯文·弗里曼的人指控我开枪射死了一名男子。

3.en: When he had first taken over the division, Clement had taken the time to talk to each and every one of his special agents.
3.cn: 克莱门特刚接管CID的时候，曾专门花时间与他手下的每一位特工进行了交谈。

0.en: He ran the UK's Mobility Division in Kabul and Basra.
0.cn: 他曾在喀布尔和巴士拉领导英军的机动师。

1.en: Grand Supreme Little Darling, New York Division? That's me.
1.cn: 超级小可爱，纽约区。那便是我！

2.en: Their mission, taking down Hydra, the Nazi rogue science division.
2.cn: 他们的任务是击垮纳粹的疯狂科研部队九头蛇。

3.en: Well, so what does he do? Oh, he works in the Fine Foods division.
3.cn: 他是做什么的？他在美食部上班。

4.en: Marvelous. So we're to be the CIA's new mutant division yes? Something like that.
4.cn: 好极了。所以我们会成为中情局的新变异部，对吗？差不多吧。

5.en: Your company has a fine foods division? It's a big company, I don't... if you... I...
5.cn: 你们公司有美食部？公司很大…

6.en: My dad never won. Of course, he wasn't in the sales division, but still, I never ever, ever forgot that.
6.cn: 我爸从来没拿到过，不过他也不在业务部，但我还是一直耿耿于怀。

7.en: Loyalty division is reporting profits of 28%. F'Nale. We're opening five new loyalty centers this month.
7.cn: 契约工部门上报的利润率达28%。弗娜莱。我们本月将再开五家契约工中心。

8.en: Steve, he was our best programmer in the division. He's the best programmer that doesn't care about our vision.
8.cn: 史蒂夫，他是我们部门最好的程序员。他是不关心我们前景的、最好的程序员

9.en: Normally, cell division follows an orderly process called the cell cycle, which is basically the life cycle of a cell.
9.cn: 一般来说，细胞分裂遵循一个叫做“细胞周期”的有序的进程，也就是一个细胞的生命周期。

10.en: It's designed to amplify brainwaves, so it could enhance your telepathic powers, help us find other mutants for our division.
10.cn: 这种设计是为了增强脑电波，以此来增强你的心灵感应能力帮助我们找到其他的变异人。

11.en: Well, he's an Asian kid. He's an Asian kid, and he's not 7-foot tall. And you don't see a lot of Asian point guards making it in division I basketball.
11.cn: 他是个亚裔孩子，没有两米身高的亚裔孩子，你很少见到亚裔的控卫能进入第一分区的篮球队

12.en: I remember it was just a very long process, Very frustrating, because I was going from pac 10 school to pac 10 school. I couldn't even get some division 3 schools to look at me.
12.cn: 我记得那个过程很长，感觉很沮丧，因为我问了一间又一间的太平洋十校联盟的院校，我甚至得不到第三分区的学校青睐

13.en: The current division of major language families represents the limit at which relationships can be established with reasonable certainty, meaning that languages of different families are presumed not to be related on any level.
13.cn: 现在对主要语系的划分，在合理的可能性内，不同语言之间的关系仅限于这几种，就意味着不同语系的语言在任一层面上都没有交集。

14.en: Oh, I'm ready. I don't know if Stuart told you what you're up against tonight, but before you stands the co-captain of the East Texas Christian Youth Holy Roller Bowling League championship team. Seven to 12 year old division. Also, Penny's pretty good.
14.cn: 当然准备好了。我不知道斯图尔特有没有告诉你今晚你的对手是谁，不过站在你面前的人就是东德克萨斯州青年基督徒圣保龄同盟会冠军队的联盟队长，7到12岁参赛组。佩妮打得也不错。
